subject: Orange Bowl (Football Game)
Football
College Athletics
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: With an Orange Bowl victory under their belts, the junior quarterback Andrew Luck, the game’s most valuable player, and Coach Jim Harbaugh might both leave for the N.F.L.
snippet: With an Orange Bowl victory under their belts, the junior quarterback Andrew Luck, the game’s most valuable player, and Coach Jim Harbaugh might both leave for the N.F.L.
